text: Laura Forgia, (born Laura Lena Forgia, 9 October 1982, in Angera), sometimes known as Lena Harva, is an Italian showgirl, model, actress and television presenter. She was born to an Italian father and Swedish mother. ==Television== {|class="wikitable" |- ! Year ! Title ! Network ! Notes !
